definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: The right for final interpretation of the rules of this event is reserved to the Publicity Department of the CPC Jiangmen Municipal Committee.
sentences.chinese: 中共江門市委宣傳部對本活動規則有最終解釋權。

sentences.english: Shanghai Communist Party Chief Chen Liangyu was removed from office and is under investigation.
sentences.chinese: 原上海市委書記陳良宇被解職，目前正在接受調查。

sentences.english: He cited Kunming's Communist Party Secretary Qiu He as an example.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲昆明市委書記仇和是典型的代表。

sentences.english: Xie Shulin, deputy secretary of the Changsha Municipal CPC Committee, attended the unveiling ceremony and conferred the plate.
sentences.chinese: 長沙市委副書記謝樹林出席成立儀式並授牌。

sentences.english: Jiamusi city secretary of the Party committee Wang Baixue with Zheng Yuanbao board chairman.
sentences.chinese: 佳木斯市委書記王柏學與鄭元豹董事長。

sentences.english: Six Changsha municipal leaders including He Jianxiang were present at the review and approval meeting.
sentences.chinese: 市委副廳級幹部何建湘等六人蔘加了這次評審會。

sentences.english: To assume the functions and responsibilities of the Municipal Foreign Affairs Office.
sentences.chinese: 承擔市委外事工作領導小組辦公室的職責。

sentences.english: A few years ago it even arrested the powerful party secretary of Shanghai, Chen Liangyu.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前甚至逮捕了很有權勢的上海市委書記，陳良宇。

sentences.english: Shao Zhanwei, the deputy secretary of municipal Party committee and Mayor of Wenzhou City, and Board chairman Zheng Yuanbao.
sentences.chinese: 溫州市市委書記邵佔維與鄭元豹董事長合影留念。

sentences.english: He was once Deputy Director of Propaganda Department of the CPC Shanghai Committee.
sentences.chinese: 曾任上海市委宣傳部副部長。

sentences.english: But the town council is mistaken; we should continue using EZ.
sentences.chinese: 但市委是錯誤的，我們應該繼續使用EZ。

sentences.english: Guilin Municipal Party Committee Secretary Liu Jun's visit.
sentences.chinese: 桂林市市委書記劉君到公司視察。

sentences.english: Dou Guanyi is head of Publicity at the Nantong branch of the Jiusan Society.
sentences.chinese: 竇觀一，九三學社南通市委宣傳部部長。

sentences.english: Gingkos are the backbone of a greenery campaign initiated by Mr. Bo, the party secretary.
sentences.chinese: 移植銀杏樹是市委書記薄熙來推行綠色運動的重點。

sentences.english: It is Shangqiu City Party Committee that provided the number.
sentences.chinese: 商丘市委給寧陵縣信訪局提供的這個數。

sentences.english: Party secretary Chen Gao presided at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 市委書記陳榮高主持會議並講話。

definition: secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
li (Chinese unit of length equal to 500 meters)
